name: Mediterranean Chickpea Salad
description: This pretty chickpea salad comes together quickly. If you can't find juicy, flavorful tomatoes, leave them out, or use halved grape or cherry tomatoes instead.
recipeCategory: easy, quick, weekday, salads and dressings
keywords: bell pepper, chickpea, tomato, low-fat, vegetarian, side dish
recipeIngredient: 1/4 cup chopped flat-leaf parsley, or a combination of parsley and other herbs, such as chives, tarragon, marjoram, basil, or mint
4 scallions, white and light green parts only, sliced (optional)
1 tablespoon red wine vinegar, champagne vinegar, or sherry vinegar
1 small garlic clove, minced or put through a press
1/4 teaspoon cumin seeds, lightly toasted and crushed or coarsely ground
2 tablespoons plain low-fat or nonfat yogurt

recipeInstructions.text: Toss together the salad ingredients. Whisk together the lemon juice, vinegar, garlic, cumin seeds, salt, pepper, olive oil and yogurt, and toss with the chickpeas.
